full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 55 of 247 183 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - cross 1 A. That is correct. 2 Q. And you were hired, along with your friend David Rogers; is that right? 3 4 A. That's correct. 5 Q. Now, when you started in 1991, Dave Rogers was the chief pilot and you were the co-captain? 6 7 A. That is correct. 8 Q. But that changed, I think, in about 2000; is that right? 9 A. That is correct, approximately. 10 Q. At that point you became the chief pilot and Dave Rogers became the co-captain? 11 12 A. That's correct. 13 Q. And you continued to work for Epstein as his chief pilot until about 2019? 14 15 A. Correct. 16 Q. So you were a pilot for Jeffrey Epstein for almost 30 years from 1991 to 2019; is that right? 17 18 A. That is correct. 19 Q. And in that time, I think you testified that you flew several different planes for him; is that right? 20 21 A. That is correct. 22 MR. VERDELL: If we could call up what is already in evidence as Government's Exhibit 311. 23 24 THE COURT: 311 you said? 25 MR. VERDELL: 311, your Honor. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011827
